00065 void
00066 RRsrcMgr::RegisterScriptParser( const tstring& keyword, Parser parser )
00067 {
00068         tstring parserName;
00069         MakeParserName( parserName, keyword );
00070         _parserMap[ parserName ] = parser;

00073 //----------------------------------------------------------
00074 bool
00075 RRsrcMgr::LoadScript( const UPath& fileName, const tstring& defKeyword, tstring& errors )
00076 {
00078         BscArrayTable arrayTable( gUExprMgr->GetGlobalArrayTable() );
00079 
00082         const BscVarTable& varTable = gUExprMgr->GetGlobalVarTable();
00083 
00085         B_ASSERT( IsKeyword( defKeyword ) );
00086 
00088         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( fileName, RFileMgr::kFlagRead );
00089         if ( !file )
00090         {
00092                 errors = "Error loading script file '";
00093                 errors += fileName.GetPathString() + "': File is damaged or missing!";
00094                 return false;
00095         }
00096 
00098         const void* fileData = file->GetData();
00099         unsigned int size = ( unsigned int )file->GetSize();
00100 
00102         BscLexer lexer;
00103         lexer.Lex( ( const char* )fileData );
00104         const SBscToken* curTok = lexer.GetTokenStream();
00105 
00108         tstring keyword;
00109         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00110         while ( curTok->tokenId != BL_EOS )
00111         {
00112                 if ( BscIsArray( curTok, arrayTable, varTable ) )
00113                 {
00115                         UExprArray* array = 0;
00116                         tstring name;
00117                         curTok += BscParseArray( &array, name, curTok, arrayTable, varTable );
00118                         arrayTable.AddArray( name, array );
00119 
00121                         continue;
00122                 }
00123                 else if ( curTok->tokenId == BL_IDENTIFIER && IsKeyword( curTok->text ) )
00124                 {
00126                         keyword = curTok->text;
00127                         ++curTok;
00128                 }
00129                 else
00130                 {
00132                         keyword = defKeyword;
00133                 }
00134 
00136                 _recentScriptName = fileName;
00137 
00139                 if ( !CreateRsrc( keyword, curTok, arrayTable, varTable, errors ) )
00140                 {
00143                         file->Purge();
00144 
00146                         std::ostringstream ss;
00147                         ss << "Error creating resource specified in script!\n"
00148                            << "File: " << fileName.GetPathString() << "\n"
00149                            << "Line: " << curTok->lineNum << "\n"
00150                            << "Reason: " << errors;
00151                         
00153                         errors = ss.str();
00154                         return false;
00155                 }
00156         }
00157 
00159         file->Purge();
00160 
00162         return true;
00163 }

00170 //----------------------------------------------------------
00171 bool
00172 RRsrcMgr::IsKeyword( const tstring& keyword ) const
00173 {
00175         if ( _stricmp( keyword.c_str(), R_KW_LOADSCRIPT ) == 0 )
00176                 return true;
00177 
00179         tstring parser;
00180         MakeParserName( parser, keyword );
00181 
00183         return _parserMap.find( parser ) != _parserMap.end();
00184 }
00185 
00186 //----------------------------------------------------------
00187 bool
00188 RRsrcMgr::CreateRsrc( const tstring& keyword, const SBscToken*& curTok, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable,
00189                                           const BscVarTable& varTable, tstring& errors )
00190 {
00192         B_ASSERT( IsKeyword( keyword ) );
00193 
00194         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00195 
00196         if ( _stricmp( keyword.c_str(), R_KW_LOADSCRIPT ) == 0 )
00197         {
00199                 B_ASSERT( false );
00200                 return false;
00201         }
00202         else
00203         {
00205                 tstring parser;
00206                 MakeParserName( parser, keyword );
00207 
00209                 ParserMap::iterator iter = _parserMap.find( parser );
00210                 B_ASSERT( iter != _parserMap.end() );
00211 
00213                 return iter->second( curTok, arrayTable, varTable, errors );
00214         }
00215 
00217         return true;
00218 }

00220 //----------------------------------------------------------
00221 void
00222 RRsrcMgr::MakeParserName( tstring& parser, const tstring& keyword ) const
00223 {
00224         parser = keyword;
00225         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < parser.length(); ++i )
00226                 parser[ i ] = tolower( parser[ i ] );
00227 }
